channel.title: Webclient likes to connect to localhost
channel.description:
Ok, My webclient keeps trying to connect to localhost, (127.0.0.1) but when I'm telling it to connect to my IP. This only happens with my webclient. Either cause it's jarred or it's a webclient I don't know. I have No-IP open, my server's run.bat is open. Variables set. Port forwarded correctly:
[img]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj168/Roboticopperatingbuddy/canseeport.png[/img]
I don't know why it's doing this I'm new to webclients so if I could please have some help I will be very grateful.
I think the soulution might be is to make the client read the IP it should connect to from client.class since it's the main class. Right now it looks in gui.class Am I correct? But how do I do this?

item.title: Webclient likes to connect to localhost
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

Ok, My webclient keeps trying to connect to localhost, (127.0.0.1) but when I’m telling it to connect to my IP. This only happens with my webclient. Either cause it’s jarred or it’s a webclient I don’t know. I have No-IP open, my server’s run.bat is open. Variables set. Port forwarded correctly:

I don’t know why it’s doing this I’m new to webclients so if I could please have some help I will be very grateful.

I think the soulution might be is to make the client read the IP it should connect to from client.class since it’s the main class. Right now it looks in gui.class Am I correct? But how do I do this?
